Text: I love this album. Still have it on wax. Thanks alot

Thanks for the album.Seeing it is the remaster,what about a FLAC version.
In mp3 it mightas well not be remastered.

Hello, first of all, I would like to thank you for uploading more Donovan for people to enjoy, I've been waiting for this ;) 

Second, I was wondering if you could make a single torrent containing all his studio albums? I would gladly seed such a torrent.

Thank you.
